name: brovmptimex2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0

-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c8, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))

comment: If a binary relation holds and the relation is the value of a binary operation built with maps-to, then the arguments to that operation are sets. (Contributed by RP, 22-May-2021.)
